Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: xena
Reviews.Content: I had an issue with the first phone, it was a used phone that came in a new box with a couple of used accessories and the phone wouldn't work on Page Plus.  I asked around and was informed it was probably because some functions were changed however, the phone was advertised as brand new.  So I got in touch with the seller who promptly replaced the phone with a new one (seems new at least) and it was activated on Page Plus without a hitch but the phone has since then developed other issues.  I don't know if its just the phone brand itself or what, but after my experience with this particular phone and another phone bought off Amazon from a different seller, I think I won't be buying anymore cell phones off Amazon, especially older models.
